A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a huge disappointment. Somehow Disney has sucked all of the life\, joy and excitement out of the Star Wars films and instead given us a terribly written\, decently well acted and incredible looking shell of a movie that was riddled equally with plot holes and modern political talking points as if serving an agenda was more important than creating a true Star Wars film.

This "inclusive" piece of crap flatly ignored the Star Wars lore that has grown over the past 40 years and who's producers seem hell-bent on obliterating any connection that might have existed with the old films in favor of heavy-handed politically correct scripts and acting. 

I'm so sorry Star Wars.....you deserved FAR better then this!
